title: Natural Language Voice Commands for Cognitive Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to use simple voice commands to set reminders and engage in cognitive games so that I can maintain my independence and cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Appointment Reminders for Cognitive Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to remind me of my appointments and activities so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Smart Reminders for Appointments
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide smart reminders for my appointments based on my behavior patterns, so that I can stay organized without feeling monitored.

title: Cognitive Support through Simplified Information Retrieval
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide simplified summaries of information so that I can easily understand and retain important details without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Error Recovery and Clarification – Contextual Hints for Task Guidance
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want the system to provide contextual hints and guidance when I make mistakes or need clarification, so that I can navigate tasks independently without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Cognitive Stimulation and Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to engage in cognitive stimulation games through voice commands so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Customizable Communication Styles
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to customize how ALFRED communicates with me so that I feel supported without being monitored, allowing me to maintain my independence and cognitive sharpness.

title: Emergency Response Activation – Voice-Triggered Alerts for Emergency Contacts
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to trigger alerts to my emergency contacts using voice commands so that I can feel safe and supported without feeling monitored.
